benchmark_details.name: ElecBench (a Power Dispatch Evaluation Benchmark for Large Language Models)
benchmark_details.overview: ElecBench introduces an evaluation benchmark for large language models (LLMs) within the power sector, addressing the lack of performance benchmarks for LLMs in this domain. The benchmark encompasses sector-specific scenarios and metrics to enhance decision-making precision in power dispatch.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation framework for large language models in the context of power system operations.

data.source: Test data generated specifically for evaluating LLMs in power system operation tasks, using both public datasets (e.g., MMLU, C-Eval) and proprietary data.
data.annotation: The data generation includes automated and manual question formulation based on professional literature and simulation scenarios.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on performance outcomes from empirical tests and simulations.
methodology.interpretation: Performance is interpreted based on how well LLMs manage to adhere to defined metrics across various scenarios.
methodology.validation: Test results validated through public release and multiple evaluation rounds involving both AI and human evaluators.
